Summary: Driving home from GF's mothers house, noticed a fast steady paced moved triangle craft out of drivers side window
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Glendale
There were no other sightings in Glendale on or around March 17th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWe left my girlfriends mothers house between 7:00PM and 7:10 ARIZONA Time. Proceeded down 36th Avenue Harmont Drive To Northern Avenue Turned right onto Northern Heading towards 75th Avenue and Northern. Right around 56th Avenue and Northern Glendale, AZ 85301 Sometime between 7:15 and 7:30PM Arizona time I looked out of my drivers side window and noticed a triangle shaped craft, flying at fairly low, much lower than I have seen planes normally fly. It had two bright white lights positioned at each end of the backend and what looked like a red flashing light between them near the bottom of the craft. By time I told my girlfriend to look, it was to far away to make out any detail but you could still see the lights on the back. So it was moving fairly fast but at a steady speed no darting or "jumping." I am not sure exactly what it was, just want to see if anyone has seen anything like it.
